Zero Exclusion, Zero Carbon, Zero Poverty

After 12 editions of the Convergences World Forum, we have opened a new chapter with the 3Zero World Forum which took place on September 2 and 3, 2021 and brought together a wide range of international change makers around a common goal: building a Zero Exclusion, Zero Carbon, Zero Poverty world. This event, filled with meetings, debates and awareness-raising on sustainable development issues, was also an opportunity to get together again after the pandemic.

In order to be accessible to everyone, all over the world, the World Forum was organised both digitally and online.

excerpt.rendered: Zero Exclusion, Zero Carbon, Zero Poverty After 12 editions of the Convergences World Forum, we have opened a new chapter with the 3Zero World Forum which took place on September 2 and 3, 2021 and brought together a wide range of international change makers around a common goal: building a Zero Exclusion, Zero Carbon, Zero […]
